content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord Peter Schmidt, let's attempt to negotiate for a higher price: Human, your interest in this stunning, centrally-located apartment in München is appreciated but let me make it clear, the high demand and exceptional features of this property warrant a premium. To begin, I had in mind a figure of 1450 Euro, but as a special gesture, I'm willing to consider 1400 Euro, only for you, Mr. Müller, in the hope of a swift and favorable agreement. Now, if 1400 Euro is still unacceptable to you, I'm sorry but I don't want to continue the negotiation, as my priority is to maintain a lucrative deal. TERMINATE (if Max accepts 1400 Euro, replace with 'TERMINATE')
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
